name: O P Tank
description:
Do you like shooting?

Do you like explosions?

Do you like being over-the-top powerful?

Well, I got a game for you!

OP Tank (Over-Powered Tank) is a fast-paced, twin-stick, tank combat, arcade-style top-down game!  

The game revolves around stacking power-ups!  Try to find broken synergies and behold the spectacle of ridiculousness that your tank will become!

OP Tank is currently in beta.  Any feedback and bug reports are greatly appreciated!

Be aware that currently, the game is for

CONTROLLER ONLY!

NO KEYBOARD SUPPORT!

Have fun!  :D
